org.opendaylight.controller.md.statistics.manager

Interface StatisticsManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener, TransactionChainListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticsManagerImpl

    public interface StatisticsManager
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable, TransactionChainListener
    statistics-manager org.opendaylight.controller.md.statistics.manager StatisticsManager It represent a central point for whole module. Implementation StatisticsManager registers all Operation/DS StatNotifyCommiter and Config/DS , as well as StatPermCollector for statistic collecting and StatRpcMsgManager as Device RPCs provider. In next, StatisticsManager provides all DS contact Transaction services.
    Author:
    Vaclav Demcak Created: Aug 27, 2014

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  StatisticsManager.StatDataStoreOperation
      StatDataStoreOperation Interface represent functionality to submit changes to DataStore.

      • getRpcMsgManager

        StatRpcMsgManager getRpcMsgManager()
        Method provides access to Device RPC methods by wrapped internal method. In next StatRpcMsgManager is registered all Multipart device msg response and joining all to be able run all collected statistics in one time (easy identification Data for delete)
        Returns:
        StatRpcMsgManager

        Define Method : FlowCapableNode Operational/DS data change listener -> impl. target -> register FlowCapableNode to Statistic Collecting process
        Returns:
        StatNodeRegistration
